price: Na ambao wanapo fanyiwa jeuri hujitetea.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ إِذَآ أَصَابَهُمُ ٱلۡبَغۡيُ هُمۡ يَنتَصِرُونَ
footnotes: Na wale ambao anapo wavamia mwenye kudhulumu wao wanajitetea nafsi zao kuupinga ule uvamizi wake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna idhā aṣābahumu al-baghyu hum yantaṣirūna
